about_the_game:
"Revive the nostalgia of River Raid with realistic graphics, previously unseen stages, and a surprising secret ending. Pilot, destroy and conquer the impossible!"

The Goal is Simple, Destroy Enemies and recover Console Pieces.

From Home you need to take off your Airplane, Just Speed up until it takes a Height where it leaves the takeoff point and you realize that you have more control of the Flight to the sides and that is where you can already shoot.

Airplane Control is on the Keys "Up" accelerates, "Down" Reduces or Brakes, "L and R" Go to Right and Left with Airplane. To "Shoot" use the Normal Mouse Click or Spacebar.

The faster Accelerates the Airplane flies but spends more Fuel. You notice when it keeps Accelerated it reaches the Maximum speed level, and it is no more than that so you can release the accelerator, because the Airplane keeps the Flight. So it spends less Fuel than keeping accelerated.

To fuel the Plane just pass the Airship "GAS".

You can also shoot them because they give you points. But if you shoot too close to the airships the explosion is too strong and you end up suffering damage. To repair the Damage just pass in the "FIX" Airship.

The Enemy Helicopter only makes its Patrol flight while the Warship fires missiles at you. The shots are endless and the more you destroy the more you earn points

As soon as you arrive at the End of the Phases, there is another clue where you need to land.

Just hold the brake that it lands until it stops and goes to the next Stage.

"The Rescue of the ATARI" is not just a game; it's a nostalgic mission. Take control of a fighter jet and relive the magic of the classic River Raid with:

  • 🎮 6 Challenging Stages where each Stage has a Console Part.

  • ✈️ Challenging enemies, such as helicopters, ships, and fighters.

  • 🔥 Cinematic scenes that enlarge the story.

  • 🌟 Epic secret phase, with a special ending for the most skilled.

  • 🕹️Invincible unlockable mode to experience nostalgia without limits.

As soon as you Finish the 6 Stages it Shows the End of the Game with all the parts together, as the Difficulty Level has a different ending however, each End has an Instruction of how to get open Bonus Stages, how to Get the Symbol of the "Aviator Star" and what it serves, Tips and also teaches how to go Direct to the Last Special Stage.

Good Adventure.

name: 3D Raid River

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: 3ª Geration
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 550 / GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: Graphics in Very Low
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win10 / Win11
  • Processor: 7ª Geration
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / RTX 1030
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default
  • Additional Notes: Graphics in High

short_description: Recover the Console that the Pirates try to destroy anyway. Travel back in time with incredible graphics
